about_the_game:
Get an exclusive minion, the Forest Pegasio! This epic minion allows you to harness more power from green gems and deal additional poison damage in PVP defense. You'll also receive materials to level up your new minion and bring them into the fight!

The Exclusive Pegasio Minion Deal Includes:

  • 1 Epic Minion (Forest Pegasio)
  • 450 Minion Shards
  • 2500 Gold
  • 1000 Food

Please note:
The contents of this DLC bundle are not tradeable or refundable.
